error.cannot_connect: Can't connect to the ecovacs API. Please check the logs
error.unknown: Unknown error. Please check the logs
error.invalid_country: Country code should be two letter code
error.invalid_continent: Continent code should be two letter code

data_description.country: The two letter country code. Ex.: us, uk
data_description.continent: The two letter continent code. Ex.: ww, eu. If your country code is not working try ww

user_advanced.description: Please select "Bumper" ONLY if you have a working bumper instance already. Otherwise, select "Cloud" please.
